data.fullContent: Latin America is a term used to describe the region of the Western Hemisphere where the Romance languages are spoken. The designation includes most of the former Spanish colonies in the Americas, as well as Brazil, Mexico, and small islands along the coast of northern South America. The term is broad in scope, and it is difficult to generalize about the literature of this region because of its diversity. In addition, many works first thought to be written in Spanish were actually written in Portuguese. In fact, the literary culture of Brazil is significantly different from that of other Spanish-speaking Latin American countries, such as Cuba and Mexico. One of the most lasting contributions of the Spanish world to literature was the literary genre known as romance. These popular literary works were aimed at a broad audience, and they were written in a simple style that made them easily accessible to all.

q1.translation: 拉丁美洲是一个术语，用来描述西半球说罗曼斯语的地区。这个国家包括大部分前西班牙在美洲的殖民地，以及巴西、墨西哥和南美洲北部沿海的小岛。这一术语的范围很广，由于该地区文学的多样性，很难一概而论。此外，许多起初被认为是用西班牙语写的作品实际上是用葡萄牙语写的。事实上，巴西的文学文化与其他讲西班牙语的拉丁美洲国家(如古巴和墨西哥)有很大的不同。

The designation includes most of the former Spanish colonies in the Americas, as ____ as Brazil, Mexico, and small islands along the coast of northern South America. The term is broad in scope, and it ____ difficult to generalize about the literature of this ____ because of ____ diversity. In addition, many works first thought to be written in Spanish were actually ____ in Portuguese. In fact, the literary culture of Brazil is significantly different ____ that of ____ Spanish-speaking Latin American countries, ____ as Cuba and Mexico.

q2.translation: 拉丁美洲是一个术语，用来描述西半球说罗曼斯语的地区。这个国家包括大部分前西班牙在美洲的殖民地，以及巴西、墨西哥和南美洲北部沿海的小岛。这一术语的范围很广，由于该地区文学的多样性，很难一概而论。此外，许多起初被认为是用西班牙语写的作品实际上是用葡萄牙语写的。事实上，巴西的文学文化与其他讲西班牙语的拉丁美洲国家(如古巴和墨西哥)有很大的不同。西班牙世界对文学最持久的贡献之一就是浪漫文学。这些受欢迎的文学作品面向广泛的读者，它们的写作风格简单，便于所有人阅读。
